member.name: WS_TCP_SSPI_USERNAME_SECURITY_CONTEXT_POLICY_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: Describes the policy specifying security context message binding using TCP channel binding with windows SSPI transport security. The bootstrap channel uses TCP channel binding with windows SSPI transport security and username/password message security.

member.name: WS_TCP_SSPI_USERNAME_SECURITY_CONTEXT_POLICY_DESCRIPTION.channelProperties
member.summary: Template description for the channel properties specified in policy.

member.name: WS_TCP_SSPI_USERNAME_SECURITY_CONTEXT_POLICY_DESCRIPTION.securityProperties
member.summary: Template description for the security properties specified in policy.
